channel.title: ~ Cleaned V1 ~ Epic Cleaning!
channel.description:
[b]Base:[/b] All-Star [b]Goal:[/b] To provide a fun base for everyone to code on, from first-timers to experts.
I am using All-Starscape as a base because everyone thinks it sucks, and that's true. Although I'm going to try and clean it out as much as I can, I just started yesterday. (June 28, 2009) It's going well, and I thought of posting a devo of it.
DO NOT think it will just be a cleaned base with almost nothing in it, it WILL have blitz timers, nearly perfect combat, and much more. Heres a list of goals:
CFGS Cleaned out - DONE! 100/99 in a skill when wearing skillcape - DONE! Reducing the client class down to 500kb - Progressing A few Shops - Progressing OK Vengeance - Progressing Fletching - Progressing
Perfect blitz timers - Not Started Perfect Barrage - Not Started Perfect Entangle, teleblock, etc.. - Not Started
Woodcutting - Not Started Fishing & Cooking - Not Started Mining - Not Started Smithing - Not Started Crafting - Not Started
Range Projectiles with accurate hits, etc... - Not Started Special Attacks for most weps - Not Started
Semi-Perfect PvP/PvM - Progressing
So yeah, those are my basic goals. Pictures don't show much, and apparently they may be fake so I have also provided a video below.
Picture of 100/99 in a skill while wearing skillcape:
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/xf7vvk.jpg[/img]
I was wearing a WC cape at the time.
Click [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RwAGkr4NNM8&feature=channel_page] [b]HERE[/b] [/url] the video of the server 1 day after I downloaded it.
Yeah that's pretty much it. I know it isn't much like I stated in the video, but I will keep this updated!
Thanks for Reading!

import java.io.FileWriter;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.util.ArrayList;

import java.util.GregorianCalendar;
import java.util.Random;
import java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList;

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {
}[/code]

item.title: ~ Cleaned V1 ~ Epic Cleaning!
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

Base: All-Star
Goal: To provide a fun base for everyone to code on, from first-timers to experts.

I am using All-Starscape as a base because everyone thinks it sucks, and that’s true. Although I’m going to try and clean it out as much as I can, I just started yesterday. (June 28, 2009) It’s going well, and I thought of posting a devo of it.

DO NOT think it will just be a cleaned base with almost nothing in it, it WILL have blitz timers, nearly perfect combat, and much more.
Heres a list of goals:

CFGS Cleaned out - DONE!
100/99 in a skill when wearing skillcape - DONE!
Reducing the client class down to 500kb - Progressing
A few Shops - Progressing
OK Vengeance - Progressing
Fletching - Progressing

Perfect blitz timers - Not Started
Perfect Barrage - Not Started
Perfect Entangle, teleblock, etc… - Not Started

Woodcutting - Not Started
Fishing & Cooking - Not Started
Mining - Not Started
Smithing - Not Started
Crafting - Not Started

Range Projectiles with accurate hits, etc… - Not Started
Special Attacks for most weps - Not Started

Semi-Perfect PvP/PvM - Progressing

So yeah, those are my basic goals. Pictures don’t show much, and apparently they may be fake so I have also provided a video below.

Picture of 100/99 in a skill while wearing skillcape:

I was wearing a WC cape at the time.

Click HERE the video of the server 1 day after I downloaded it.

Yeah that’s pretty much it. I know it isn’t much like I stated in the video, but I will keep this updated!

Thanks for Reading!

Read full topic
